div.head: An Acrostick-Sonnet. To his learned and welbeloued friend, Mr.

lg.l: Rapt (I say) with so rare view,
Thanks (me thinks) at least, was due.
Heere, I found such fragrant flowers,
Meet, the Muses Browes t'haue tyred:
As, They (then) are, thus grac'd by Thee,
Neuer, may They, Grace, deny Thee.

div.head: Ad eundem: Per eundem.
div.l: I'd thither trade, for so rare Marchandize.
